<small>Also see: **<big>[[H7473|רֹעִי]]</big>** | **<big>[[H7423|רְמִיָּה]]</big>**</small>

 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעָה‎</span><sub>167</sub> **verb** ==pasture, tend, graze== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rê°û***</u></abbr>, verb ***pasture***, noun ***ruler***, Tel Amarna <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ru—i***</u></abbr> (as Canaanism) [[BDB#Wkl|Wkl]]<sup>No. 181, 11</sup>; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְעָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, all = Biblical Hebrew); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרָעָה‎</span> [[Mic.5.3|Mic 5:3]] +, 1 singular suffix consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זּרְעִיתִים‎</span> [[Ezek.34.13|Ezek 34:13]], 3 plural suffix consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרָעוּם‎</span> [[Jer.23.4|Jer 23:4]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְעֶה‎</span> [[Isa.27.20|Isa 27:20]] +, jussive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵ֫רַע‎</span> [[Job.20.26|Job 20:26]], suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְעֶנָּה‎</span> [[Ps.80.14|Ps 80:14]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִרְעֵם‎</span> [[Ps.78.72|Ps 78:72]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיַּר‎</span> **Hiph\`il** [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]]), etc.; ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְעֵה‎</span> [[Mic.7.14|Mic 7:14]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְעֵם‎</span> [[Ps.28.9|Ps 28:9]] feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְעִי‎</span> [[Song.1.8|Song 1:8]] masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְעוּ‎</span> [[Gen.29.7|Gen 29:7]] ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִרְעוֺת‎</span> [[Gen.37.12|Gen 37:12]] +, etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֶה‎</span> [[Gen.30.36|Gen 30:36]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעִי‎</span> [[Ps.23.1|Ps 23:1]] +; feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעָה‎</span> [[Gen.29.9|Gen 29:9]]; [[Prov.25.19|Prov 25:19]], etc.; — 

**1.** transitive 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** ***pasture, tend*** (***pascere***), literal, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן‎</span> [[Gen.30.31|Gen 30:31]]; [[Gen.30.36|Gen 30:36]]; [[Gen.37.12|Gen 37:12]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Exod.3.1|Exod 3:1]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.17.15|1Sam 17:15]]; [[1Sam.25.16|1Sam 25:16]]; [[Isa.61.5|Isa 61:5]], accusative of asses [[Gen.36.24|Gen 36:24]] ([[BDB#P|P]]), kids [[Song.1.8|Song 1:8]] accusative (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן‎</span>) omitted [[Gen.29.7|Gen 29:7]]; [[Gen.37.13|Gen 37:13]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location) v[[Gen.37.16|Gen 37:16]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), [[Song.1.7|Song 1:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְבִּיץ‎</span>), [[Job.24.2|Job 24:2]] ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Me|Me]] [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרֹעוֺ‎</span>); — metaphor <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גֹּרֶן וָיֶקֶב לֹא יִרְעֵם‎</span> [[Hos.9.2|Hos 9:2]], but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵדָעֵם‎</span> [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]]; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָוֶת יִרְעֵם‎</span> [[Ps.49.15|Ps 49:15]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** figurative of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, accusative of person, [[Gen.48.15|Gen 48:15]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) God, who ***shepherded*** me; with accusative of people, as flock [[Hos.4.16|Hos 4:16]]; [[Isa.40.11|Isa 40:11]]; [[Mic.7.14|Mic 7:14]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּשִׁבְטֶ֑ךָ‎</span>), [[Ezek.34.13|Ezek 34:13]] (pregnantly, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location), v[[Ezek.34.14|Ezek 34:14]] v[[Ezek.34.15|Ezek 34:15]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִרְבִּיץ‎</span>), v[[Ezek.34.16|Ezek 34:16]]; [[Ps.28.9|Ps 28:9]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** figurative of ruler, and teacher, accusative of people, as flock, [[2Sam.5.2|2Sam 5:2]] = [[1Chr.11.2|1Chr 11:2]]; [[2Sam.7.1|2Sam 7:1]] = [[1Chr.17.6|1Chr 17:6]]; [[Ps.78.72|Ps 78:72]]; [[Jer.3.15|Jer 3:15]]; [[Jer.23.2|Jer 23:2]]; [[Jer.23.4|Jer 23:4]]; [[Ezek.34.2|Ezek 34:2]]; [[Ezek.34.3|Ezek 34:3]]; [[Ezek.34.8|Ezek 34:8]]; [[Ezek.34.10|Ezek 34:10]]; [[Ezek.34.23|Ezek 34:23]] (twice in verse); [[Zech.11.4|Zech 11:4]]; [[Zech.11.7|Zech 11:7]] (twice in verse); [[Zech.11.9|Zech 11:9]] of teaching, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְעוּ רַבִּים שִׂפְתֵי צַדִּיק‎</span> [[Prov.10.21|Prov 10:21]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> of people [[Ps.78.71|Ps 78:71]] absolute [[Mic.5.3|Mic 5:3]] with accusative of person reflexive ***pastured*** (fed, enriched) ***themselves*** [[Ezek.34.2|Ezek 34:2]]; [[Ezek.34.8|Ezek 34:8]]; [[Ezek.34.10|Ezek 34:10]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** especially participle <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֶה‎</span>, etc., as substantive = ***shepherd, herdsman:*** (I) literal, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹן רֹעֵה‎</span> [[Gen.4.2|Gen 4:2]]; [[Gen.46.32|Gen 46:32]]; [[Gen.46.34|Gen 46:34]]; [[Gen.47.3|Gen 47:3]] (all [[BDB#J|J]]), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֶה בַּצּ‎</span> [[Gen.37.2|Gen 37:2]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Sam.16.11|1Sam 16:11]]; [[1Sam.17.34|1Sam 17:34]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֵי מִקְנֶה‎</span> [[Gen.13.7|Gen 13:7]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(ה)ר‎</span> alone, singular [[Amos.3.12|Amos 3:12]] + 7 t. (all in simile); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעָה‎</span> ***shepherdess***, [[Gen.29.9|Gen 29:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּלִי רֹעֶה אֱוִילִי‎</span> [[Zech.11.15|Zech 11:15]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּלִי‎</span> **2 c**), as symbol; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(הָ)רֹעִים‎</span> [[Amos.1.2|Amos 1:2]]; [[Exod.2.17|Exod 2:17]]; [[Exod.2.19|Exod 2:19]] ([[BDB#J|J]]) [[1Sam.21.8|1Sam 21:8]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַבִּיר הָר‎</span>; [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] Löhr <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָרָצִים‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span>; [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 45</sup> [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֹבִיל הָעְַיָרִים‎</span>, but compare [[BDB#We|We]]) + 8 t. + [[Isa.31.4|Isa 31:4]] (simile), [[Isa.38.12|Isa 38:12]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעִים‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעִי‎</span> [[BDB#Perles|Perles]]<sup>29</sup> [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup> compare [[BDB#Di|Di]]), compare (suffix) [[Gen.13.8|Gen 13:8]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּלִי הָרֹעִים‎</span> [[1Sam.17.40|1Sam 17:40]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּלִי‎</span> **3**); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּידעֵֿקֶד הָרִעִיס‎</span>. (2) figurative of ruler (as often Assyrian; compare Greek (Homer) <span class="bdbLangGreek">ποιμένα</span> <span class="bdbLangGreek">λαῶν</span>), absolute singular [[Jer.17.16|Jer 17:16]] **\*\***figurative of prophet (but Aq Symm <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ6‎</span> Gie Du Co <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵרָעָה‎</span>); [[Zech.10.2|Zech 10:2]]; [[Zech.11.16|Zech 11:16]]; [[Zech.13.7|Zech 13:7]]b + 8 t. Jeremiah, Ezekiel; suffix of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעִי‎</span> [[Isa.44.28|Isa 44:28]] (of Cyrus), [[Zech.13.7|Zech 13:7]]a.; [[Zech.13.17|Zech 13:17]] (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעִי הָאֱוִילִי‎</span> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Now|Now]] [[BDB#GASm|GASm]]); absolute plural [[Isa.56.11|Isa 56:11]]; [[Jer.2.8|Jer 2:8]]; [[Jer.3.15|Jer 3:15]]; [[Mic.5.4|Mic 5:4]]; [[Zech.10.3|Zech 10:3]]; [[Zech.11.5|Zech 11:5]]; [[Zech.11.8|Zech 11:8]] + 18 t. Jeremiah [[Ezek.34|Ezek 34]], + (of Assyrian leaders) [[Nah.3.18|Nah 3:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֵי יִשׂ‎</span> [[Ezek.34.2|Ezek 34:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צאֹנוֺ רֹעֵי‎</span> [[Isa.63.11|Isa 63:11]] (but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֵה‎</span> [of Moses] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] Targam [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] and others). (3) epithet of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעִי ׃ י‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.23.1|Ps 23:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֵה יִשׂ‎</span> [[Ps.80.2|Ps 80:2]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֶה אֶבֶן יִשׂ‎</span> [[Gen.49.24|Gen 49:24]] (poem in [[BDB#J|J]]; read construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֵה‎</span>. compare Commentaries); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵרֹעֶה אֶחָד‎</span> [[Eccl.12.11|Eccl 12:11]] [[BDB#De|De]] [[BDB#Wild|Wild]], &lt; ***president*** of assembly of sages [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] [[BDB#SS|SS]]. 

**2.** intransitive ***feed, graze:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** literally ==of cows, sheep==, etc.: with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location [[Gen.41.2|Gen 41:2]]; [[Gen.41.18|Gen 41:18]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[1Chr.27.29|1Chr 27:29]] with accusative of pasture [[Isa.30.23|Isa 30:23]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַל‎</span> location [[Zeph.2.7|Zeph 2:7]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֵי הַיָּם‎</span> for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲלֵיהֶם‎</span>, see [[BDB#Now|Now]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶלמֿוּל‎</span> location [[Exod.34.3|Exod 34:3]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); absolute [[Isa.5.17|Isa 5:17]]; [[Isa.11.7|Isa 11:7]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבץ‎</span>; but see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעה‎</span> below) [[Isa.27.10|Isa 27:10]] (\|\| ***id.***), [[Isa.65.25|Isa 65:25]]; [[Jonah.3.7|Jonah 3:7]]; [[Job.1.14|Job 1:14]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** figurative of idolater, [[Isa.44.20|Isa 44:20]] ***he feedeth on ashes*** (accusative); compare [[Hos.12.2|Hos 12:2]] Ehpraimitic source ***feedeth on wind*** (acc); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִוֶּלֶת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּי כְסִילִים יִר‎</span> [[Prov.15.14|Prov 15:14]] (so [[BDB#Vrss|Vrss]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]]; [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פני‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פי‎</span>) ***the mouth of fools feeds on folly*** (Toy; [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] √ II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעה‎</span>, [[BDB#Gerber|Gerber]]<sup>162</sup> below III. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעה‎</span>); in Canticles, with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> location, figurative of lover [[Song.2.16|Song 2:16]]; [[Song.6.2|Song 6:2]]; [[Song.6.3|Song 6:3]] of breasts (like gazelles) [[Song.4.5|Song 4:5]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** figurative, of Israel as flock [[Isa.14.30|Isa 14:30]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבץ‎</span>), read (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַ֯‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּכָרֹי‎</span> ***in my pasture(s)***, for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּכוֺרֵי‎</span>, Koppe [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] (otherwise [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt</sup>, compare [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]); [[Zeph.3.13|Zeph 3:13]] (\|\| ***id.***.); with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלדְּֿרָכִים‎</span> [[Isa.49.9|Isa 49:9]] with accusative of pasture-land [[Jer.50.19|Jer 50:19]]; [[Mic.7.14|Mic 7:14]]; [[Ezek.34.14|Ezek 34:14]]b ( + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶל‎</span> location), v[[Ezek.34.18|Ezek 34:18]] v[[Ezek.34.19|Ezek 34:19]] hence ***crop, strip***, i.e. devastate, of conqueror, with accusative of land [[Mic.5.6|Mic 5:6]], cf; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתיָֿדוֺ‎</span> [[Jer.6.3|Jer 6:3]] so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְעוּךְ קָדְקֹד‎</span>; [[Jer.2.16|Jer 2:16]] accusative of Israel under figure of vine (subject foes, as beasts) [[Ps.80.14|Ps 80:14]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** subject wind, with accusative of person [[Jer.22.22|Jer 22:22]], i. e. drive them away; subject fire, with accusative of thing, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵרַע‎</span> [[Job.20.26|Job 20:26]], but read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵרָע‎</span>, **Niph\`al** ([[BDB#Ol|Ol]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Hoffm|Hoffm]] [[BDB#Siegf|Siegf]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]]; otherwise [[BDB#Du|Du]]). <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֶה עֲקָרָה֯‎</span> [[Job.24.21|Job 24:21]] is difficult; [[BDB#Bu|Bu]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֵרַע‎</span> for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span>; more radical conjectures in [[BDB#Du|Du]]. **Niph\`al** possibly [[Job.20.26|Job 20:26]], see **2 d** above **Hiph\`il** [[Ps.78.72|Ps 78:72]] [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]], see **1 c** above 



<small>Also see: **<big>[[H7473|רֹעִי]]</big>**</small>

 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעֶה‎</span> ***shepherd***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹעָה‎</span> ***shepherdess***, see √ 1 d. above 

<small>Also see: **<big>[[H7489|רָעַע]]</big>**</small>

 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעָה‎</span>] **verb** probably ==associate with== (compare [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>69 ff.</sup> but also [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>ZMG iiv (1900), 154 f.</sup>; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ru°a, ruttu***</u></abbr>, ***neighbour***, ***fellow*** (masculine and feminine; compare Jäger<sup>BAS i. 483,486</sup>); so Bedouin <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***master, owner***, Wallin<sup>ZMG v (1851), 9</sup> Jayakar<sup>JA xxi. 851</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***marriage***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***yoke***; Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵעוּת‎</span> ***friendship*** is from Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֵעַ‎</span>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperative*** masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּרְעֵה אֱמוּנָה‎</span> [[Ps.37.3|Ps 37:3]] ***cherish faithfulness*** ([[BDB#Hup|Hup-Now]] [[BDB#RV|RV]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]]); &gt; ***feed seocurely*** ([[BDB#Bae|Bae]]; I.<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעה‎</span>; ***feed on*** (his) ***faithfulness*** [[BDB#AmRV|AmRV]]); ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְסִילִים רֹעֶה‎</span> [[Prov.13.20|Prov 13:20]] ***one associating with fools***, so <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זֹלְלְים ר‎</span> [[Prov.28.7|Prov 28:7]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎זוֺנוֺת‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Prov.29.3|Prov 29:3]] ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] and others think these figurative from I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעה‎</span>, see **2 b**). **Hithpa\`el** 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַלתִּֿתְרַע‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶתבַּֿעַל אָ֑ף‎</span> [[Prov.22.24|Prov 22:24]] ***do not make companionship with a bad-tempered man***; perhaps also 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְרָעֶינָה‎</span> [[Isa.11.7|Isa 11:7]] ([[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Or. i. 21</sup>; Deceased Wife's Sister 399 [[BDB#Brd|Brd]] [[BDB#Du|Du]] [[BDB#Che|Che]] [[BDB#Hpt|Hpt]]) cow and bear ***shall be each other's companions***; + ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְרָעֹת‎</span> [[Prov.18.24|Prov 18:24]] (Toy, for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִתְרֹעֵעַ‎</span>) there are [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֵשׁ‎</span>, for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִישׁ‎</span>] friends (merely) ***to be companions*** (see II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעע‎</span> ***near the end***). 



 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָעָה‎</span>] **verb denominative Pi\`el** ==be a special friend==; — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵרֵעֵהוּ אֲשֶׁר רֵעָה לוֺ‎</span> [[Judg.14.20|Judg 14:20]] his comrade who ***had been 'best man'*** ([[BDB#GFM|GFM]]) to him. 

 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רעה‎</span> (√ of following; compare Biblical Hebrew III.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רעה‎</span>).
